line_1: Our Souls shall mount at thy Discharge
line_2: To their bright Source, and shine at large
Some small return for gifts so large

line_1: Now, wrath on Cattle to discharge,
line_2: Hail stones as deadly fall and large

line_1: I ne'er can come home till you send a Discharge.
line_2: For my Means are so small, and my Bills are so large,

line_1: Tho' farthings for guineas could buy my discharge.
line_2: But can't think of payment, the sum is so large,
